Package remodel.meta

Class Operation

java.lang.Object
remodel.meta.Nominal
remodel.meta.Property
remodel.meta.Operation
Direct Known Subclasses:
Rule
public class Operation
extends Property
Operation is a kind of Property representing an executable operation. An Operation may have formal parameters, a list of Variables, and has an executable CompoundExpression body. The operations "asList" and "asSet" are predefined, added to every Concept.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Anthony J H Simons

      public Operation​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String type)
      Creates an Operation with the given name and result type.

      name - the name of this Operation.
      type - the result type of this Operation.

    • Operation

      public Operation​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String type, boolean mark)
      Creates a predefined Operation with the given name and type.
      Parameters:
      name - the name for this Operation.
      type - the result type for this Operation.
      mark - a mark indicating predefined.

  • Method Details

    • findProperty

      public Property findProperty​(java.lang.String name)
      Looks up a Property by its name in the current context. Searches the list of Variable formal parameters, and if a match is found, returns that Variable. Otherwise, continues to search for the Property in the Concept owning this Operation.
      Overrides:
      findProperty in class Property
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the Property.
      Returns:
      the Property.

    • addVariable

      public void addVariable​(Variable variable)
      Adds a Variable to the list of variable parameters.
      Parameters:
      variable - the Variable to add.

    • getVariables

      public java.util.List<Variable> getVariables()
      Returns the Variable parameters of this Executable.
      Overrides:
      getVariables in class Property
      Returns:
      the Variables as a List.

    • getExpression

      public CompoundExpression getExpression()

    • isExecutable

      public boolean isExecutable()
      Reports that Operation and its subclasses are executable.
      Overrides:
      isExecutable in class Property
      Returns:
      true if this Property is executable.
